name: Coconut Rum
description: Coconut rum is a flavored rum that incorporates the sweet and tropical taste of coconut. It is a popular and versatile spirit used in various cocktails, providing a distinct coconut flavor to mixed drinks. Coconut rum is typically made by infusing or flavoring rum with natural or artificial coconut extracts. It is often enjoyed in tropical and beach-themed cocktails, where its coconut notes complement other fruity or citrusy ingredients. Coconut rum is a key component in cocktails like PiÃ±a Colada and Coconut Mojito, adding a hint of the tropics to the overall flavor profile.
